title: Magic Mansion: An Enchanting May-December Gay Romance
description: Professor Topaz is tired of fending off advice that he should retire in Vegas where magicians his age have an easier time finding work. Ricardo Hart's career has sunk so low, he's resorted to shaking his moneymaker at bachelorette parties. But there's a casting call for a new reality show called Magic Mansion that could change everything for these two gay stage magicians, one recovering from the loss of his partner, and the other awe-struck by the presence of his idol. Each is poised for a critical second at fame, and at love. Who will win? Step into the Mansion, and find out.... Whether you love reality TV, or just love to hate it, this age-gap romance features plenty of unexpected twists and turns to keep you turning the pages. Watch romance blossom between stately veteran stage magician Professor Topaz and sexy up-and-comer Ricardo under the unflinching gaze of the camera, where every move is recorded, and each vote threatens to knock them out of the competition. This 2012 novel features an updated cover and minor text edits.
author: Jordan Castillo Price
